Sentencas: A three-dimensional model of a methanol-fueled solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) that sufficiently considers the rib structure to understand the effects of operating conditions on a methanol-fueled SOFC is developed.
Titulo: Coupled Electrochemical-Thermo-Stress Analysis for Methanol-Fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The model considers the coupling of electrochemical reactions, mass transport, heat transfer, and thermal stress.
Titulo: Coupled Electrochemical-Thermo-Stress Analysis for Methanol-Fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The overall performance of the methanol-fueled SOFC is investigated under the influence of operating voltage, steam-to-carbon ratio, and porosity.
Titulo: Coupled Electrochemical-Thermo-Stress Analysis for Methanol-Fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The results indicate that as the operating voltage increases, the overall anode switches from exothermic to endothermic, and the stress of the anode first decreases and then increases.
Titulo: Coupled Electrochemical-Thermo-Stress Analysis for Methanol-Fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: As the steam-to-carbon ratio increases, the overall temperature of the anode decreases.
Titulo: Coupled Electrochemical-Thermo-Stress Analysis for Methanol-Fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, when the steam-to-carbon ratio is less than 1, the temperature at the inlet is lower than the ambient temperature.
Titulo: Coupled Electrochemical-Thermo-Stress Analysis for Methanol-Fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the first principal stress on the anode increases as the steam-to-carbon ratio increases.
Titulo: Coupled Electrochemical-Thermo-Stress Analysis for Methanol-Fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Increasing the porosity reduces the length of the three-phase boundary, thereby decreasing the current density and the overall temperature and thermal stress on the anode.
Titulo: Coupled Electrochemical-Thermo-Stress Analysis for Methanol-Fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This study revealed the effects of operating conditions on the methanol-fueled SOFC, especially on the rib, and contribute to controlling the operant conditions for SOFC fueled by a mixture of steam and methanol.
Titulo: Coupled Electrochemical-Thermo-Stress Analysis for Methanol-Fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A three-dimensional model of a methanol-fueled solid oxide fuel cell is developed, considering the influence of rib.
Titulo: Coupled Electrochemical-Thermo-Stress Analysis for Methanol-Fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A high proportion of water in the fuel increases the thermal stress within the anode.
Titulo: Coupled Electrochemical-Thermo-Stress Analysis for Methanol-Fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The rib affects the distribution of the methanol decomposition reaction rate within the anode.
Titulo: Coupled Electrochemical-Thermo-Stress Analysis for Methanol-Fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: By increasing the porosity of the anode, the thermal stress at the position under the rib can be reduced.
Titulo: Coupled Electrochemical-Thermo-Stress Analysis for Methanol-Fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
